channel.title: Dylan Bochman - Blog
channel.description: Articles and insights on Site Reliability Engineering, Incident Management, DevOps, and System Reliability.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: A brief introduction while this blog is under development.
item.author: dylan@dylanbochman.com (Dylan Bochman)

item.title: Building This Site with AI Tools
item.description: Building a personal website with AI-assisted tools, and what that work surfaced about how they behave during real development.
item.author: dylan@dylanbochman.com (Dylan Bochman)

item.title: Fixing 404 Errors on GitHub Pages SPAs
item.description: Pre-rendering React routes to eliminate console errors on a statically hosted single page application.
item.author: dylan@dylanbochman.com (Dylan Bochman)

item.title: Uptime Monitoring for a Personal Site
item.description: Setting up external monitoring for a portfolio site, and why treating small systems like production systems is a useful habit.
item.author: dylan@dylanbochman.com (Dylan Bochman)

item.title: Writing a Runbook for My Personal Website
item.description: I built an operational runbook for my portfolio site. Overkill? Maybe. But it was a good exercise.
item.author: dylan@dylanbochman.com (Dylan Bochman)
